name: BBQ Chicken Sloppy Joes
author: Laura Bland Huerta
summary: These ground chicken Sloppy Joes are a healthier alternative to regular beef Sloppy Joes.
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
¼ cup water, or more as needed
¼ cup dill pickle slices, or to taste
¼ cup sliced onion, or to taste
directions: Spray a pan with cooking spray and heat over medium-high heat
Add chicken, onion, bell pepper, salt, and pepper
Cook and stir until chicken is no longer pink, 5 to 7 minutes
Add barbeque sauce, ketchup, 1/4 cup water, and mustard
Mix thoroughly and add more water if the mixture seems too thick
Reduce heat to low and simmer for 10 to 15 minutes
Serve on hamburger buns topped with Cheddar cheese, pickle slices, and sliced onion
